title: Where You Feel Lonely
itunes:author: Guests: Greg & Erin Smalley
itunes:summary:
Every couple, no matter how good their marriage is, has an area in the relationship where they feel lonely. To offer a word of encouragement, John, Greg and Erin discuss how seasons of loneliness will change, and why you can grow through them.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the Smalley's book "Reconnected: Moving from Roommates to Soulmates in Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-22?refcd=1346703

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/where-you-feel-lonely/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/sharing-the-load-with-your-spouse-digital-download/?refcd=1346703

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
